price: (40) Then will you make the deaf hear, [O Muḥammad], or guide the blind or he who is in clear error?
arabic: أَفَأَنتَ تُسۡمِعُ ٱلصُّمَّ أَوۡ تَهۡدِي ٱلۡعُمۡيَ وَمَن كَانَ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: afa-anta tus'miʿu al-ṣuma aw tahdī al-ʿum'ya waman kāna fī ḍalālin mubīnin
